data.title: Proxima 2 (2021 film)
data.meta_description: This is the sequel to the original movie, Proxima. For the original movie, see Proxima (2020 film). data.text:
This is the sequel to the original movie, Proxima. For the original movie, see Proxima (2020 film). Proxima 2 is a cancelled American-Leapian film, being the sequel of the original movie. It was planned to be released into theaters on May 28, 2021 in the United States and United Leaps.

Cancellation[]

On May 20, 2021, 8 days prior to the official release of the sequel, the film was cancelled due to the ending of the film franchise it is on and with the jacknjellify crew moving on to keep working on BFDI content.

As of July 2021 and furthermore, the film has not been planned to be released into the public, but is however kept private at the LeapFrog studios.

Trivia[]

Red Sarsa is not directing the sequel film due to old age, the inability of speaking and possibility of dying soon. Chris Antelome is replacing her for directing.

Three new voice actors were hired to voice certain characters in the film, with Michael Huang voicing the most characters and Satomi Hinatsu voicing the least.

Kenzie Bryant is a new script writer for the sequel.

10th Century Damian quit upcoming production on the film due to its current defunct state on January 4, 2021.
